column5: Hey guys, flying out this Saturday with Mattice, heading into Whitewter lake for some early season pike and walleye. It will be my first fly in trip, can honestly say im, pretty jacked up about it! Will post some pics when i return home. Talked to Don last night ice still on whitewater but moving out fast.

You will have a great time with MLO, first class operation and people there. Never been to whitewater this early as our group always goes last week of june. John who is the camp attendant will be able to point out some hotspots for you. The sandbar just out from camp always provided good action for us at dusk. Have fun!
Don and crew do a great job, your going to love it.
I have heard nothing but great things about MLO, made the choice that much easier!

We fished whitewater lake in 08 with MLO and it was an awesome experience. This year we are going back June 3rd-10th. We wore ourselves out on the pike and walleyes, over 800 in a week. Walleyes ran on the small side but we did get over 10 pike in the 40-47." Good luck and look forward to seeing how you do. Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Hey JBMac My friend and I will be there at Whitewater on Monday (6/5) through the 10th. Looking forward to meeting you up there. _colorado (Jerry)
